name: Release v1.0.6
body:
* Voyager now fires a number of Events.  You can find these classes under the `TCG\Voyager\Events\` namespace for your listening pleasure.
* Additional translations
* Bugfixes

name: Release v1.0.5
body:
* Updates to a few translations (ES, IT, RU)
* Bugfixes

name: Release v1.0.4
body: - Bugfix for admin menu subitem display

name: Release v1.0.3
body:
- Media Manager bugfixes (#1761)
- Rename misnamed migration file (#1774)
  - You will need to delete  `2017_11_04_000000_alter_post_nullable_fields_table.php`
- Refactored admin menu to fix numerous bugfixes (#1813)
- Bugfix for menu ordering (#1811)
- New feature to allow cropping of images in Media Manager (#1823)

name: Release v1.0.2
body:
* Bugfixes
* Enabled Policies to automatically handle new permissions (as long as they're in the correct format.  docs in progress)
* Updated translations

name: Release v1.0.1
body: Bugfixes

name: Release v1.0.0
body:
With this, we deem Voyager Production-ready!

We're sure there are still some minor issues that need resolutions, so please continue to open issues and pull requests.

With this release, we have a ton of new features and bugfixes, here are just a couple of them:

* Re-built auth/permissions system
* Relationship manager built-in
* Settings Groups 
* Bulk Delete functionality
* Compass Reference Section
* Hooks (functionality to build hooks/plugins in Voyager)
* Smaller Footprint (the package is about 1/4 the size)

And so much more. Don't you hate using something that hasn't released a version 1.0 yet... Sometimes we do, but now it's all good because we are at version 1.0!

name: v0.11.14

body:
Yet another patch 🎉 
- Make use of [readmore](https://i.gyazo.com/034e420277ddb8a74b945c64c8d4f477.png) library (was unused until now) for `text`, `text_area` and `rich_text_box` input types in BROWSE views #672
- Allow `select_multiple` input type to simply [work like a `select_dropdown`](https://i.gyazo.com/5ee31264726e89fd8b031bc2c8da7c5c.png) (with `options` instead of `relationships`) with `JSON` columns. #672
- Properly display of `select_multiple` rows for both `relationships` and simple `options` in [READ and BROWSE](https://i.gyazo.com/fc816559b833e1c18191ac3ccb1ab734.png) views #672
- Added support for `description` property in each BREAD row's `details` section, [to display it below each input](https://i.gyazo.com/c4970c93849e4e68410e61b93418cbdd.png) #672
- Implemented logic to make use of `checkbox`es `checked` property when creating and editing #672
- Modified `validation` logic for BREAD rows so it can be setup either as a string like `"rules": "required|max:80"`, or an array #672

All credits goes to @Frondor 👍

name: Ability to Customize Admin Icon and Loader. Fixes to the Relationship Functionality
body:
**Customize Admin Icon & Loader**
Admin can now customize the Helm Loader icon and they can also change the loader. Inside of the settings you will now have 2 more settings which are the `admin_loader` and `admin_icon_image`. If you do not have that setting you can create a new setting with `admin_loader` and `admin_icon_image` as the key and setting the type to `image`.

You can try out the following 2 images. Here is another loader image:
![example-loader](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/601261/21556060/86f2256a-cdd2-11e6-8548-d0da26a35c55.png)

And here is a white icon (you may not be able to see it, but you can right-click and download it)
![example-admin-icon](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/601261/21556077/9c165dbc-cdd2-11e6-96a1-a87e33aca239.png)

**Relationship Fixes**

Now, when you add a dropdown and specify a relationship, you can also add a few more options to the dropdown, like so:

```
{
    "relationship": {
        "key": "id",
        "label": "name"
    },
    "default" : "option1",
    "options" : {
        "option1": "Option 1 Text",
        "option2": "Option 2 Text"
    }
}
```

This is similar to how you would have done a normal dropdown. Above the `option1` and `option2` will now be values in the dropdown along with the relationship.

Also, if you were to add more than one many-to-many multi-select to any BREAD DataType, it would only sync the data for one of those multi-selects. This is now fixed and will allow you to use as many multi-selects as you would like inside of your BREAD Data Types.

name: v0.10.6
body:
Some bug fixes and server side pagination 🎉
- Few issues with the Menu Builder and the Bootstrap menu display have been fixed.
- Now users can choose to make their BREAD types have server side pagination. If you have more than 1,000 rows in a table you'll want to use server side otherwise it will take awhile for the page to load.
- A new upgrade process, which includes going to `/admin/upgrade`, this will add any new database changes that have been added since your last release.

@oschettler Thanks for your code submission. As always thanks to @marktopper for all your continuing contributions.

name: v0.9.28
body:
Now you no longer needs to add the following service provider.

```
Intervention\Image\ImageServiceProvider::class,
```

Cause now `VoyagerServiceProvider` register this provider within.

However if you do already have added the service provider to you configuration, you may remove it but are not forced to, since Laravel ensures that a provider is only added once.
